fko.chessly.ui.SwingGUI

Class GridBagHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.ui.SwingGUI.GridBagHelper

  • public final class GridBagHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some helper methods for the GridBagLayout Manager. It cannot be instanciated.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Insets zeroInsets
      Simply no insets.

        public static final java.awt.Insets zeroInsets

    • Method Detail

      • constrain

        public static void constrain(java.awt.Container container,
                             java.awt.Component component,
                             int grid_x,
                             int grid_y,
                             int grid_width,
                             int grid_height,
                             int fill,
                             int anchor,
                             double weight_x,
                             double weight_y,
                             int top,
                             int left,
                             int bottom,
                             int right)
        Create the constraints and insets for the component of a container.
        Parameters:
        container - the container
        component - the component
        grid_x - the line of the component in the grid
        grid_y - the row of the component in the grid
        grid_width - the number of rows this component spans horizontally in the container
        grid_height - the number of lines this component spans vertically in the container
        fill - the fill is used when the components display area is larger than the component's requested size. It determines if the component is resized and if so, how.
        anchor - the anchor is used when the components display area is smaller than the component's requested size. It determines where, within the display area, to place the component.
        weight_x - specifies how to distribute extra horizontal space
        weight_y - specifies how to distribute extra vertical space
        top - the minimum amount of space between the top of the component and the top of the display area
        left - the minimum amount of space between the left of the component and the left of the display area
        right - the minimum amount of space between the right of the component and the right of the display area
        bottom - the minimum amount of space between the bottom of the component and the top of the display area

      • constrain

        public static void constrain(java.awt.Container container,
                             java.awt.Component component,
                             int grid_x,
                             int grid_y,
                             int grid_width,
                             int grid_height,
                             int fill,
                             int anchor,
                             double weight_x,
                             double weight_y,
                             java.awt.Insets insets)
        Create the constraints and insets for the component of a container.
        Parameters:
        container - the container
        component - the component
        grid_x - the line of the component in the grid
        grid_y - the row of the component in the grid
        grid_width - the number of rows this component spans horizontally in the container
        grid_height - the number of lines this component spans vertically in the container
        fill - the fill is used when the components display area is larger than the component's requested size. It determines if the component is resized and if so, how.
        anchor - the anchor is used when the components display area is smaller than the component's requested size. It determines where, within the display area, to place the component.
        weight_x - specifies how to distribute extra horizontal space
        weight_y - specifies how to distribute extra vertical space
        insets - definies the amount of space around the component

      • constrain

        public static void constrain(java.awt.Container container,
                             java.awt.Component component,
                             int grid_x,
                             int grid_y,
                             int grid_width,
                             int grid_height,
                             int top,
                             int left,
                             int bottom,
                             int right)
        Create the constraints and insets for the component of a container. This version sets the component into one position in the grid abd allows to specify the insets of the component.
        Parameters:
        container - the container
        component - the component
        grid_x - the line of the component in the grid
        grid_y - the row of the component in the grid
        grid_width - the number of rows this component spans horizontally in the container
        grid_height - the number of lines this component spans vertically in the container
        top - the minimum amount of space between the top of the component and the top of the display area
        left - the minimum amount of space between the left of the component and the left of the display area
        right - the minimum amount of space between the right of the component and the right of the display area
        bottom - the minimum amount of space between the bottom of the component and the top of the display area

      • constrain

        public static void constrain(java.awt.Container container,
                             java.awt.Component component,
                             int grid_x,
                             int grid_y,
                             int grid_width,
                             int grid_height)
        Create the constraints and insets for the component of a container. This version simply sets the component to a position in the grid.
        Parameters:
        container - the container
        component - the component
        grid_x - the line of the component in the grid
        grid_y - the row of the component in the grid
        grid_width - the number of rows this component spans horizontally in the container
        grid_height - the number of lines this component spans vertically in the container
